reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Emergency initiative supporting the vulnerable population in the Central African Republic

description.narrative: Il programma mira a rafforzare il sostegno delle persone vulnerabili nella RCA, migliorare la qualità dell'assistenza sanitaria, la resilienza di donne e bambini e le pratiche agricole per la prevenzione della malnutrizione. Al contempo, l'iniziativa intende consolidare i risultati ottenuti da progetti AICS in corso o già conclusi.

The Programme aims at strengthening the support of vulnerable people in RCA, improving the quality of healthcare, the resilience of women and children, the Agricultural practices for malnutrition prevention. At the same time, the initiative intends to consolidate the results obtained from AICS's ongoing or already completed projects.

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

By 2030, end preventable deaths of newborns and children under 5 years of age, with all countries aiming to reduce neonatal mortality to at least as low as 12 per 1,000 live births and under-5 mortality to at least as low as 25 per 1,000 live births
End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere
End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
